company.whitepaper.text: WAVES is a decentralized blockchain platform focusing on custom blockchain tokens operations. National currencies transfer is maintained on the WAVES blockchain through compliant gateway operators.
company.whitepaper.title: Whitepaper
company.team.title: Our Team
company.about.text: The Waves Platform is a global public blockchain platform, founded in 2016. Waves Platformâ€™s mission is to reinvent the DNA of entrepreneurship around the world by providing a shared infrastructure, offering easy-to-use, highly functional tools to make blockchain available to every person or organisation that can benefit from it.
cookieConsent.text: According to our {policy}, this website uses ğŸªcookies to improve functionality and performance. Some cookies are essential for the operation of the website, you can turn them off only via browser settings. Other cookies can be disabled by this tool.
developers.DEX.subtitle: Our nodes contain anÂ order matcher which isÂ used toÂ power our decentralised exchangeÂ â€” enabling token trades that donâ€™t require tokens toÂ beÂ transferred from your blockchain account toÂ aÂ separate exchange.
developers.DEX.text.p1: All operations within the DEX are secure and validated byÂ blockchain nodes. Since the DEX isÂ open source and aÂ part ofÂ every node, each user can run their own instance ofÂ the DEX.
developers.DEX.text.p2: The matcher exposes its own REST API for accessing the order book and submitting orders. This allows users toÂ implement any kind ofÂ tradingÂ UI orÂ trading bots.
developers.DEX.title: Decentralised Exchange (DEX)
developers.description.algorithm.text: Wavesâ€™s blockchain uses a Proof-of-stake (PoS) algorithm, with participants being rewarded from the commission on transactions made.
developers.description.algorithm.title: Proof-of-Stake algorithm
developers.description.fees.text: The minimum fee for the transfer ofÂ funds isÂ 0.001Â WAVES. The fixed fee for market orders isÂ 0.003Â WAVES. The price ofÂ releasing aÂ token isÂ 1Â WAVES, and you doÂ not pay toÂ use your own token.
developers.description.fees.title: Low, fixed transaction fees
developers.description.network.text: Our new PoS consensus algorithm enables vastly increased network bandwidth, allowing for hundreds ofÂ transactions per second.
developers.description.network.title: High network channel capacity
developers.description.transactions.text: You donâ€™t need smart contracts toÂ release tokens orÂ for leasing and making deals onÂ the decentralised exchange, because transactions are performed natively.
developers.friendlyAPI.subtitle: Our open source client application uses the same API. You can explore itÂ and implement any kind ofÂ client application yourself.
developers.friendlyAPI.text: Our nodes expose the REST API allowing access to all blockchain data (transaction history, balances, etc.) as well as operations for creating a new transaction â€” itâ€™s easy to make a transfer, exchange, issue of tokens or lease fund transactions programmatically.
developers.friendlyAPI.title: Developer-friendly API
developers.ng.title: Unbeatable speed and throughput
developers.ng.subtitle: Based on the Waves-NG protocol, our system supports up to 6,000 transactions per minute, leaving other blockchains far behind.
developers.ng.text: In the NG model, the next miner is selected in advance. This miner creates a â€˜key blockâ€™, which is then immediately filled with microblocks containing transactions, which requires no further proof-of-work. Whilst maintaining the open structure of the protocol, this allows transactions to be confirmed as fast as network latency will allow.
developers.smart.title: Smart Contracts &Â Smart Accounts
developers.smart.subtitle: WeÂ are building simple, scalable, reliable and robust tools toÂ perform secure and transparent business operations onÂ the Waves blockchain.
developers.smart.text: WeÂ have created aÂ new programming language, RIDE, which makes itÂ very easy for anyone toÂ set upÂ aÂ Smart Account. ToÂ bring you the sophisticated tools required for launching aÂ dApp, weÂ are creating Smart Contracts, which enables users toÂ execute any set ofÂ instructions onÂ the Waves blockchain.
developers.text: These apps run on a custom built blockchain, an enormously powerful shared global infrastructure that can move value around and represent the ownership of property.
developers.title: Build applications on the blockchain
developers.wavesEcosystem.pywaves: Python API client and useful scripts
developers.wavesEcosystem.title: Waves Ecosystem
developers.wavesNetwork.explorers: Here are explorers for MainNet and TestNet Waves clusters:
developers.wavesNetwork.text: New versions ofÂ the Waves Node are tested byÂ the development community onÂ the TestNet cluster, where any developers can play with new features and ensure their applications are ready for upcoming releases.
developers.wavesNetwork.title: Waves Network
developers.wavesNode.subtitle: Having your own node will allow you toÂ build secure and high-load applications onÂ top ofÂ it.
developers.wavesNode.text: Itâ€™s extremely easy toÂ install and run your own instance ofÂ the Waves Node. ItÂ allows you toÂ mine WAVES and MRTs (Miners Reward Tokens), and act asÂ aÂ leasing pool toÂ aggregate mining power from other users.
developers.wavesNode.title: Running Your Waves Node

feedback.mobileGo.description: Crypto-centric mobile gaming platform and store
feedback.mobileGo.quote: MobileGo aims toÂ bring the advantages ofÂ cryptocurrency toÂ the gaming industry. The project, which raised $53 million atÂ its crowdfund, isÂ creating aÂ community ofÂ gamers and developers around the GStoreÂ â€” anÂ open platform onÂ which all games are purchased for the gamecredits cryptocurrency, via aÂ seamless integration with the GWallet. MobileGo will also use smart contracts toÂ power peer-to-peer e-sports tournaments.
feedback.mobileGo.title: MobileGo becomes largest blockchain crowdsale inÂ history!
feedback.primalbase.quote: WeÂ are very grateful toÂ all who participated early and provided strong support toÂ the project. Thanks toÂ this and efforts ofÂ new executive team weÂ managed toÂ achieve aÂ great deal ofÂ positive developments. WeÂ are about toÂ open our new offices inÂ Amsterdam and Berlin, and launch aÂ number ofÂ supporting digital tools. Although noÂ further PBT sale will ever beÂ carried out, related complementary projects will beÂ launched toÂ help increase the value ofÂ PBT for existing investors asÂ well asÂ provide upsides for any new participants. Please stay subscribed toÂ our mailing list toÂ keep informed about project developments and expansions.
feedback.primalbase.title: Real Estate onÂ Blockchain becomes aÂ reality: Primalbase raised over 3000Â BTC during crowdsale

getWaves.exchanges.title: Buy Waves on Exchanges
getWaves.howToBuyWaves.quote: The Waves DEX, aÂ decentralised exchange integrated within the desktop Waves Client, allows you toÂ buy, store, sell orÂ exchange digital assets onÂ the Waves Platform. Just place your order toÂ buy WAVES orÂ your first assets!
getWaves.howToBuyWaves.step2: Deposit Euros, USD, Bitcoin orÂ Ethereum toÂ your Waves wallet
getWaves.howToBuyWaves.step3: Place your order onÂ the Waves DEX and buy your first WAVES!
getWaves.howToBuyWaves.title: To buy WAVES using DEX:
getWaves.text: You will need WAVES toÂ create custom tokens and fuel other operations onÂ the Waves platform, like transferring and trading tokens. There are lots ofÂ ways toÂ get hold ofÂ WAVES, including through centralised exchanges, through the Waves DEX, and from the Waves client using aÂ credit card via partnerships with third parties. You can trade them onÂ popular exchanges such asÂ Bittrex, and again onÂ the DEX, against many other counterparty currencies, including EUR, USD and BTC.
getWaves.title: Get Waves
getWaves.wallet.text:
You will need WAVES to create custom tokens and fuel other operations on the Waves platform, like transferring and trading tokens.

There are lots of ways to get hold of WAVES, including through centralised exchanges, through the Waves DEX, and from the Waves client using a credit card via partnerships with third parties. You can trade them on popular exchanges such as Bittrex, and again on the DEX, against many other counterparty currencies, including EUR, USD and BTC.
getWaves.wallet.title: Buy Waves in  a Waves client

home.DEX.tradeNoLimits.text: There are noÂ limits onÂ withdrawals, and any cryptocurrency purchased immediately appears inÂ your walletâ€™s balance.
home.DEX.tradeNoLimits.title: Trade without limits
home.DEX.tradeQuickly.text: AÂ centralised matcher and high channel capacity allow you toÂ make deals asÂ quickly asÂ onÂ aÂ centralised exchange, but without the risk ofÂ losing your money.

home.issuingTokens.text.one: To get your own internal digital currency. Use blockchain for crowdfunding, pay for goods, services. Use tokens to create voting systems and loyalty or discount programmes. A total of {tokensIssued} tokens have been released on Waves.

Get started
with blockchain
home.plannedFeatures.title: Planned Features
home.quote: InÂ 2017Â we partnered with Deloitte toÂ launch the development ofÂ aÂ legal framework for wider adoption ofÂ blockchain technologies.
home.subscribe.text: We do more than just develop the technical aspects of the platform: we also participate actively in integrating blockchain into real-world applications to grow the crypto economy.
home.subscribe.title: Donâ€™t Miss Important News

home.wavesNg.text: Waves NG is making the platform easier and faster. It allows us to handle hundreds of transactions per second and means we are the fastest blockchain in the world.

home.wavesClient.text: The current version of the Waves client is a wallet, decentralised exchange (DEX), and a tool to release tokens.
home.wavesClient.title: The Waves Client
howToWallet.step2: Fill your wallet with Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Zcash, US dollars or Euros.
howToWallet.step3: You can convert them to Waves tokens using the decentralized exchange, which you can find on the Waves client.
howToToken.step2: To release tokens, youâ€™ll need 1 Waves to pay the commission. You can buy it directly in the client with $ or â‚¬.
howToToken.step3: Go to the Token Creation tab and fill out a simple form. Your token will appear on the network within about a minute.
leasing.description.subtitle: Leased proof-of-stake (LPoS) allows Waves holders to profit by using their balances to secure the networkâ€Šâ€”â€Šwhilst retaining full control of their funds.
leasing.description.text: Custom tokens platform Waves has implemented balance leasing within its lite client, allowing every user toÂ take part inÂ securing the network and profit from transaction feesâ€Šâ€”â€Šwithout requiring any additional technical knowledge orÂ the need toÂ download the blockchain. Leased WAVES remain inÂ the full control ofÂ the account holder, and can beÂ transferred orÂ exchanged atÂ any point.
leasing.description.title: What is Waves leasing?
leasing.nodes.text: Here you can find a list of the top nodes by WAVES balance. You can find a full list at {pywavesLink}
leasing.nodes.title: Top Waves nodes
leasing.revenue.calc.description: You can use this tool toÂ calculate how much you can make leasing WAVES, but beÂ aware that results will vary each week.
leasing.revenue.p1.text1: The more WAVES you lease toÂ aÂ node, the more rewards you will receive. Nodes pay out different proportions ofÂ the transaction fees and MRT they receive, and some also use their own tokens asÂ rewards. Check the list ofÂ Waves {nodesLink} and select the one with the best conditions for you!
leasing.revenue.p1.text2: You can think ofÂ leasing your WAVES asÂ aÂ little like depositing money inÂ aÂ bank account. You receive income from them but can still withdraw them atÂ any time.
leasing.revenue.p1.title: How much will my node earn?
leasing.startLeasing.p1.title: 1. Download Waves Client
leasing.startLeasing.p2.title: 2. Deposit WAVES to your account
leasing.startLeasing.p3.title: 3. Decide {nodesLink} to support with your WAVES. Paste the nodeâ€™s address in the required field in the LEASING tab.
leasing.startLeasing.p4.title: 4. Youâ€™re done! Your balance will now generate income without even leaving your wallet. Payments are usually transferred once a week.
leasing.startLeasing.text: You can lease any sum from 0.002 WAVES. Your funds remain in your wallet and you can cancel the lease and regain access to the WAVES at any time, with just two clicks. You can also set up your own node and start {miningLink} yourself if you have at least 1000 WAVES.
leasing.startLeasing.title: Start leasing your funds
leasing.text: By helping secure the Waves blockchain you can earn up to 5% per year on your WAVES balance. Simply lease your WAVES to a mining pool and you will receive a share of transaction fees in proportion to the amount you commit.
leasing.title: Use your WAVES balance to generate income
mining.algorithms.pos.text: Waves use a Proof-of-Stake algorithm in which the WAVES you own (or that have been leased to you) reflect your mining power. The more you own, the higher your chances of processing the next block and receiving the transaction fees as a reward. Essentially itâ€™s a form of interest on your balance.
mining.algorithms.pos.title: Proof-of-stake
mining.algorithms.pow.text: Mining cryptocurrencies often requires expensive hardware, specialist knowledge and hours of dedicated work and patience. Thatâ€™s because most cryptocurrencies are mined through Proof-of-Work.
mining.algorithms.pow.title: Proof-of-work
mining.algorithms.text: Install your node and helpÂ us power the Waves blockchain. AÂ simple hosted server isÂ all the hardware youâ€™ll need.
mining.algorithms.title: Mining in Waves
mining.nodes.node1.quote: WavesGoâ€™s mission isÂ toÂ make blockchain accessible toÂ the masses. This ideal isÂ reflected inÂ our different services. First and foremost, weÂ are proud toÂ run Wavesâ€™ largest mining pool, toÂ which hundreds ofÂ community members have already leased their stakes. WeÂ maintain and develop the officially endorsed, feature-rich blockchain explorer atÂ WavesGo. com, which isÂ visited byÂ thousands ofÂ users every single day. WeÂ also have more services and products inÂ the pipeline, all ofÂ which serve one major goalÂ â€” toÂ expand the thriving ecosystem around the Waves Platform. WavesGo isÂ more than proud toÂ beÂ able toÂ support Waves inÂ such aÂ meaningful way.
mining.nodes.node1.title: WavesGo isÂ the foremost Waves node, with the biggest balance and aÂ thriving community ofÂ supporters. The node distributes the WavesGo token toÂ anyone who leases their funds toÂ it.
mining.nodes.node2.quote: Running our fullnode since the start ofÂ the platform gaveÂ us aÂ thorough knowledge about the Wavesplatform and weÂ are also providing 30+Â years combined experience inÂ IT and 7+Â years inÂ Crypto. WeÂ have aÂ lot toÂ offer with our Wavesnode.NET fullnode for starting projects onÂ the Wavesplatform and are proud owners ofÂ the first shop accepting payments inÂ aÂ Waves asset. With our services weÂ are taking technical work out ofÂ our clients hands and providing them aÂ trustfull partner toÂ work with atÂ the Wavesplatform. Clients will have their peace ofÂ mind, letting Wavesnode.NET handle all the technical work needed. WeÂ can assist clients step byÂ step inÂ the process and provide strategic advice onÂ how toÂ move forward with their projects. All our services toÂ beÂ bought with our WNET token.
mining.nodes.node2.title: Wavesnode.NET represents aÂ developing community inÂ Holland. The node accepts multiple tokens for fees and has aÂ growing list ofÂ supportersÂ â€” asÂ well asÂ offering unique Waves merchandise!
mining.nodes.text: A Waves node isnâ€™t just a way to get paid for securing the network. These are hubs of activity around which entrepreneurs build new businesses and engage the community. You can find a list of Waves nodes at {pywavesLink}
mining.nodes.title: A focus for the community
mining.revenue.calc.description: You can use this tool toÂ calculate how much you can make byÂ mining WAVES, but beÂ aware that results will vary each week.
mining.revenue.calc.title: Calculate the reward
mining.revenue.p1.text1: Since rewards across the entire network are distributed proportionately, the more WAVES you hold inÂ your node, the greater share ofÂ blockchain transaction fees you will receive. The final amount will also depend onÂ overall network activity and the level ofÂ fees generated.
mining.revenue.p1.text2: In addition to any WAVES they receive, nodes will receive 60 MRT per block for the first 70 blocks they generate per day, with 30 MRT per block awarded thereafter.
mining.revenue.p1.title: How much will my node earn?
mining.revenue.p2.text1: Miners Reward Token (MRT) is a bonus token that is distributed to miners with every block created. MRT is intended to be used as a means for new token issuers to reward nodes for processing their transactions, paying fees in their own token.
mining.revenue.p2.text2: AsÂ aÂ Waves token, MRT can beÂ transferred and traded freely onÂ Wavesâ€™ decentralised exchange (DEX).
mining.revenue.p2.title: What is MRT?
mining.revenue.text: By supporting the Waves network, you can earn up to 5% per year on your balance.
mining.revenue.title: Revenues
mining.startMining.configure.title: 3. Configure Node
mining.startMining.done.title: 4. Ready! Your node automatically starts mining.
mining.startMining.download.title: 1. Download the Waves Node
mining.startMining.install.title: 2. Install Node
mining.startMining.text: You donâ€™t need any fancy hardwareÂ â€” just aÂ simple hosted server and atÂ least 1,000Â WAVES. You can also run aÂ public mining pool and have users {leasingLink} their funds toÂ you, thereby increasing your profits and sharing them with the community.
mining.startMining.title: Start mining
mining.text: Install your node and helpÂ usÂ secure the network and power the Waves blockchain. You donâ€™t need any fancy hardware and can earn upÂ toÂ 5% yearly onÂ your WAVES balance.
mining.title: Join the Waves Network
mining.wavesNodesMap.text: Nodes are aÂ critical part ofÂ our ecosystem. Run aÂ Waves node, help process transactions, ask the community toÂ lease their WAVES toÂ you and get paid for securing the network!
mining.wavesNodesMap.title: Waves nodes
popup.telegram.title: Join our Telegram channel
product.DEX.description:
By trading on a centralized exchange, you risk losing your funds in the event of hacking, which has happened on almost all popular exchanges. The main advantage of our exchange is that the money is always stored in your wallet, and the match only compares orders.

You retain complete control over your funds when trading them on our decentralized exchange. The DEX is powered by a matcher, which stores user orders and sends token exchange transactions for fulfilled orders.
product.DEX.dexVolume.label: 24h DEX volume
product.DEX.safety: Stop worrying about the safety of your assets
product.DEX.title: Decentralised Exchange
product.DEX.wavesPrice.label: waves price
product.DEXFeatures.fees.text: There isÂ aÂ very low and fixed fee onÂ our exchange, which doesnâ€™t depend onÂ the size ofÂ the trade. The commission per order isÂ 0.003Â WAVES. IfÂ anÂ order isnâ€™t executed inÂ full, anÂ incomplete and proportional commission isÂ calculated for you. ByÂ canceling the order, you lose nothing.
product.DEXFeatures.fees.title: Donâ€™t waste money onÂ high fees
product.DEXFeatures.frontRunning.text: Your orders are transferred toÂ the matcher over anÂ encrypted channel and are not visible toÂ other participants until the moment ofÂ execution. This excludes the possibility ofÂ unscrupulous traders manipulating information about anÂ upcoming trade.
product.DEXFeatures.frontRunning.title: Protection from front-running and other fraud
product.DEXFeatures.security.text: All transactions happen onÂ the blockchain, and only the order list isÂ held onÂ the centralised matcher. This allowsÂ us toÂ take full advantage ofÂ both centralised and decentralised technologies. InÂ addition, implementing the latest developments has allowedÂ us toÂ increase network capacity toÂ hundreds ofÂ transactions per second.
product.DEXFeatures.security.title: Trade quickly andÂ securely
product.DEXFeatures.tradeNoLimits.text: OnÂ centralised exchanges, itâ€™s the administrators who decide which pairs will beÂ traded. Wavesâ€™ DEX allows you toÂ trade any token pairs that are onÂ the blockchain. InÂ addition, there are noÂ restrictions onÂ the withdrawal ofÂ funds from the DEX. AsÂ soon asÂ your transaction isÂ complete, the cryptocurrency will appear inÂ your wallet.
product.DEXFeatures.tradeNoLimits.title: Trade without limits
product.DEXTopPairs.title: Top pairs
product.howToToken.step2: Fill your wallet with Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Zcash, US dollars or Euros.
product.howToToken.step3: You will need to pay a small commission in Waves to trade any pairs, so buy Waves in advance.
product.howToTrade.text: After that, put the token on sale in the DEX tab at a price that will ensure that you achieve your projectâ€™s fundraising goals. You can create orders in several pairs if you want to accept different currencies, and you can even sell them at different prices to create bonus conditions for the first investors.
product.howToTrade.title: How doÂ I start trading onÂ the Waves DEX?
product.howToWallet.step1: First, download and install the Waves client.
product.howToWallet.step2: Fill your wallet with Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Zcash, US dollars or Euros.
product.howToWallet.step3: You can convert them toÂ Waves tokens using the decentralised exchange (DEX), which you can find onÂ the Waves client.
product.howToWallet.title: How doÂ I start using myÂ Waves wallet?
product.interest.leasing.text: Any sum of Waves can be leased to miners to generate interest. You can refund at any time in 2 clicks.
product.interest.leasing.title: Leasing
product.interest.mining.text: Waves uses aÂ proof-of-stake algorithm. ToÂ start mining, all you need toÂ doÂ isÂ toÂ download and launch the node, and have 1,000Â WAVES inÂ your wallet.
product.interest.mining.title: Mining
product.issuingTokens.description.p1: Cryptographically secured blockchain tokens allow any business toÂ issue its own internal digital currency onÂ the blockchain toÂ pay for goods and services within its project. The actual cost ofÂ tokens (Custom Application Tokens) isÂ established using open market mechanisms.
product.issuingTokens.description.p2: The role ofÂ the token isÂ determined byÂ the nature ofÂ each individual project and can beÂ integrated into itÂ not only asÂ anÂ internal currency but also asÂ aÂ token for decentralised voting, asÂ aÂ rating system, orÂ loyalty program.
product.issuingTokens.loyalUsers.text: ByÂ holding anÂ ICO not only doÂ you receive money for development, but you also gain loyal users for your product who believe inÂ the project and are ready toÂ become its first followers asÂ well asÂ give honest feedback.
product.issuingTokens.loyalUsers.title: Get loyal users ofÂ your product
product.issuingTokens.raiseFunds.text: ByÂ releasing blockchain tokens, you provide valuable services toÂ network users, such asÂ the possibility ofÂ transferring value inÂ the form ofÂ certain convenient units, therefore attracting funds for the development ofÂ your project.
product.issuingTokens.raiseFunds.title: Raise funds for the development ofÂ your project
product.issuingTokens.title: Issuing your tokens, token sales
product.mobileWallet.text: Donâ€™t forget to download the mobile wallet for iOS & Android.
product.mobileWallet.title: Start using your Waves wallet
product.text: Issue, store, manage, trade, and analyze your digital assets safely with Waves blockchain platform and decentralized exchange.
product.title:
Use blockchainÂ â€”
itâ€™s easy with Waves
product.wallet.createWallet.text: In addition to Waves tokens, thousands of other kinds of tokens have also been released on the platform, many of which have gone through an ICO and have huge potential. We support fiat money ($, â‚¬) as well as cryptocurrencies such as bitcoin, ethereum, ethereum classic, and more. The list is constantly expanding.
product.wallet.createWallet.title: Create a multiple-currency wallet
product.wallet.security.text: Your balance is stored on a blockchain that only you can access. Only you can manage your crypto assets. Your tokens are stored on a blockchain that only you can access.
product.wallet.security.title: Take advantage of our platformâ€™s high security
product.wallet.transfer.text: Waves has a high network speed with hundreds of transactions per second and a small commission, which makes it as convenient as possible to transfer cryptocurrency between network members instantly.
product.wallet.transfer.title: Transfer funds from person toÂ person
products.wallet.title: Create a multi­currency wallet
products.wallet.text: The Waves wallet includes fiat (USD, EURO, TRY) and cryptocurrency gateways (BTC, ETH, LTC, ZCASH). These currencies can be sent anywhere in the world in seconds, because Waves is the fastest open blockchain in existence. They can also be traded on the built-in decentralised exchange (DEX) against thousands of other tokens. To date, around 10,000 different assets exist on the Waves blockchain.
products.token.title: Issue, distribute and use your tokens
products.token.description: The Waves blockchain is capable of processing thousands of transactions per minute. The platform can be used to create, distribute and use custom-designed tokens. Issuing a token on the Waves platform offers multiple benefits, including the ability to trade the token freely on the built-in decentralised exchange.
products.token.howToStartTrading.title: How do I start trading on the Waves DEX?
products.token.howToStartTrading.descr: After that, put the token on sale in the DEX tab at a price that will ensure that you achieve your projectâ€™s fundraising goals. You can create orders in several pairs if you want to accept different currencies, and you can even sell them at different prices to create bonus conditions for the first investors.
products.token.issuingTokens.description: Cryptographically secured blockchain tokens allow any business toÂ issue its own internal digital currency onÂ the blockchain toÂ pay for goods and services within its project. The actual cost ofÂ tokens (Custom Application Tokens) isÂ established using open market mechanisms.

The role ofÂ the token isÂ determined byÂ the nature ofÂ each individual project and can beÂ integrated into itÂ not only asÂ anÂ internal currency but also asÂ aÂ token for decentralised voting, asÂ aÂ rating system, orÂ loyalty program.
ByÂ holding anÂ ICO not only doÂ you receive money for development, but you also gain loyal users for your product who believe inÂ the project and are ready toÂ become its first followers asÂ well asÂ give honest feedback.
Get loyal users ofÂ your product
ByÂ releasing blockchain tokens, you provide valuable services toÂ network users, such asÂ the possibility ofÂ transferring value inÂ the form ofÂ certain convenient units, therefore attracting funds for the development ofÂ your project.
Raise funds for the development ofÂ your project

products.dex.title: Trade securely on the  decentralised exchange
products.dex.description: The crypto world isÂ rapidly evolving, and Waves isÂ atÂ the forefront ofÂ it, always making sure its tech isÂ up-to-date. Wavesâ€™ decentralised exchange isÂ the fastest, most secure and user-friendly DEX inÂ the world. With the release ofÂ aÂ new version, the trading experience onÂ DEX has become something truly outstanding!
products.dex.trade: Trade on the world's fastest decentralised digital asset exchange
products.dex.mobileApp.title: Use the mobile app for quick access to the DEX
products.dex.mobileApp.text: Donâ€™t forget to download the mobile application for iOS & Android.
products.dex.features.security.title: Trade quickly andÂ securely
products.dex.features.security.text: All transactions happen onÂ the blockchain, and only the order list isÂ held onÂ the centralised matcher. This allowsÂ us toÂ take full advantage ofÂ both centralised and decentralised technologies. InÂ addition, implementing the latest developments has allowedÂ us toÂ increase network capacity toÂ hundreds ofÂ transactions per second.
products.dex.features.tradeNoLimits.text: OnÂ centralised exchanges, itâ€™s the administrators who decide which pairs will beÂ traded. Wavesâ€™ DEX allows you toÂ trade any token pairs that are onÂ the blockchain. InÂ addition, there are noÂ restrictions onÂ the withdrawal ofÂ funds from the DEX. AsÂ soon asÂ your transaction isÂ complete, the cryptocurrency will appear inÂ your wallet.
products.dex.features.fees.text: There isÂ aÂ very low and fixed fee onÂ our exchange, which doesnâ€™t depend onÂ the size ofÂ the trade. The commission per order isÂ 0.003Â WAVES. IfÂ anÂ order isnâ€™t executed inÂ full, anÂ incomplete and proportional commission isÂ calculated for you. ByÂ canceling the order, you lose nothing.
products.dex.features.fees.title: Donâ€™t waste money onÂ high fees
products.dex.features.frontRunning.text: Your orders are transferred toÂ the matcher over anÂ encrypted channel and are not visible toÂ other participants until the moment ofÂ execution. This excludes the possibility ofÂ unscrupulous traders manipulating information about anÂ upcoming trade.
products.dex.features.frontRunning.title: Protection from front-running and other fraud

smartContracts.title: RIDE on Waves blockchain with smart contracts
smartContracts.description: Scalable failsafe language to serve both basic account security cases and rich decentralized application.
smartContracts.block1.text: Waves platform isÂ building aÂ blockchain based solutions for real-world business. WeÂ are providing smart and flexible tools that will fit for most ofÂ the business cases and able toÂ work with real-world data.
smartContracts.features.title: What Will Smart Contracts Bring to Waves?

Two-factor authentication
Cannot beÂ controlled byÂ one person alone
The necessary parties must provide their private keys simultaneously

smartContracts.features.2.text: Trustless exchange ofÂ cryptocurrencies hosted onÂ different blockchains
smartContracts.features.3.title: Token Freeze
smartContracts.features.3.text: Preventing buyers from selling orÂ transferring tokens out ofÂ their address for aÂ certain amount ofÂ time
smartContracts.features.4.title: Decentralised applications
smartContracts.features.4.text: dApps based onÂ Turing-complete smart contracts will beÂ able toÂ undertake complex processes onÂ the blockchain according toÂ aÂ range ofÂ different conditions
smartContracts.plans.title: Two-stage Implementation
smartContracts.plans.stage1.left.title: Stage 1
smartContracts.plans.stage1.right.text: Lightweight implementation ofÂ smart contracts with limited functionality, based onÂ the most popular and in-demand use cases.
smartContracts.plans.stage2.left.title: Stage 2
smartContracts.plans.stage2.right.text: Decentralised applications based on Turing-complete smart contracts will be able to undertake complex processes on the blockchain according to a range of different conditions. After the release of Smart Accounts, we'll continue smart contract development to implement sophisticated logic to address almost any computational task.
smartContracts.usefulLinks.title: Useful links
wavesNG.descriptions.1.text: InÂ aÂ traditional blockchain model, blocks are discovered atÂ roughly similar intervals and the most recent transactions are processed once aÂ miner has earned the right toÂ submit them toÂ the network. This places fundamental limits onÂ the capacity ofÂ the blockchain. Bitcoin, for example, has aÂ theoretical maximum ofÂ roughly 3Â tps.
wavesNG.descriptions.1.title: Traditional blockchain model
wavesNG.descriptions.2.text: InÂ theÂ NG model, the next miner isÂ selected inÂ advance. The miner creates a â€˜key blockâ€™, which isÂ then immediately filled with microblocks containing transactions, which requires noÂ further proof-of-work. Whilst maintaining the open structure ofÂ the protocol, this allows transactions toÂ beÂ confirmed asÂ fast asÂ the network will allow. Wavesâ€™ proof-of-stake approach further improves speed, increasing capacity byÂ aÂ factor ofÂ aÂ hundred orÂ more.
wavesNG.descriptions.2.title: NG model
wavesNG.descriptions.text.p1: Waves-NG is a next-generation consensus algorithm, based on the Bitcoin-NG proposal made by Cornell Computer Science academics Emin GÃ¼n Sirer and Ittay Eyal.
wavesNG.descriptions.text.p2: Bitcoin-NG was designed to address bitcoinâ€™s scalability issues, increasing network throughput to hundreds of transactions per second. Waves-NG adapts this proposal to Wavesâ€™ proof-of-stake consensus, and is the first ever implementation of the protocol in a production blockchain system.
wavesNG.descriptions.title: About Waves-NG
wavesNG.fastest.title: Waves â€” fastest blockchain in the world
wavesNG.fastest.text1: Waves NG is making the platform easier and faster. It allows us to handle hundreds of transactions per second and means we are the fastest blockchain in the world.
wavesNG.fastest.text2: The Waves-NG code was deployed on mainnet, with miners tasked with signalling whether the proposal should be activated. After the required threshold of 80% of blocks within the voting period was reached, NG was launched. The subsequent waiting period has now elapsed and we are pleased to announce that NG is live!
wavesNG.news.title:
News about
Waves-NG
wavesNG.preview.p1.text: Anyone will beÂ able toÂ download node version 0.8 with Waves-NG for TestNet. WeÂ will lease TestNet WAVES toÂ anyone who wants toÂ run aÂ TestNet node. Nodes will start voting for Waves-NG using the new Waves Activation Protocol.
wavesNG.preview.p1.title: 1. TestNet release
wavesNG.preview.p2.text: Once the voting conditions have been met, Waves-NG will beÂ activated onÂ TestNet and weÂ will perform aÂ public stress test. Anyone will beÂ able toÂ generate transactions and monitor how the network responds inÂ realtime toÂ the increased throughput.
wavesNG.preview.p2.title: 2. Stress test
wavesNG.preview.p3.text: When itÂ isÂ clear that the new version works asÂ expected, weÂ will release Waves-NG onÂ MainNet and everyone can upgrade their nodes. Waves-NG will again beÂ activated after the conditions ofÂ the Waves Activation Protocol have been met.
wavesNG.preview.p3.title: 3. MainNet release
wavesNG.preview.p4.text: The Waves Activation Protocol ensures that hardforks required for upgrades occur smoothly. Miners set approval flags for new features inÂ their blocks. IfÂ 80% ofÂ miners have approved the feature after 5,000 blocks orÂ roughly 3.5 days (3,000 blocks onÂ TestNet), itÂ isÂ automatically activated after aÂ further 5,000Â blocks.
wavesNG.preview.p4.title: 4. Activation
wavesNG.stressTest.anounce: Charts below show current TestNet statistics. After the public stress test starts you will be able to generate TestNet transactions from this page.
wavesNG.stressTest.chart1.text: Number ofÂ transactions waiting inÂ queue for confirmation. The greater the number ofÂ transactions processed byÂ the network every minute, the faster this decreases.
wavesNG.stressTest.chart1.title: UtxPool size
wavesNG.stressTest.chart2.text: Number of transactions mined (confirmed) by the blockchain per minute.
wavesNG.stressTest.chart2.title: Transaction throughput
wavesNG.stressTest.test.error: Whoops! Network isÂ stressed and your transaction did not makeÂ it. Try again!
wavesNG.stressTest.test.errorFatal: Sorry, it seems our testing server is experiencing some network issues. We're working on it, please try again later.
wavesNG.stressTest.test.text: When you click this button you will automatically generate aÂ series ofÂ transactions. You can watch how network speed and characteristics respond inÂ real time!
wavesNG.stressTest.test.title: Transaction confirmation
wavesNG.stressTest.title:
Test Waves-NG
on TestNet
wavesNG.text: The Waves network has implemented a ground-breaking new protocol that will allow its blockchain to process thousands of transactions per minute.
